Abilities.Name: Fireball
Abilities.Ability: Cost 2 Energy: Choose an enemy unit within 7 range of Akaedyn Mage. Roll a d20. On a roll above 10, assign 1 distress to that unit.

Abilities.Name: Meteor
Abilities.Ability: Cost 3 Energy: Sacrifice Ethereal Mage or An Allied Unit adjacent to them: Choose any location within 30 range. Put down the metor template and roll a d6. On a 2-6, roll the d6 again and move the template from it's center in the direction of the first d6 as marked on the template a range equal to the second d6 rolled. All units within the template take 5 distress. (This ability can not be used during the first round of the game)
